snippet: An unheralded American, Brian Stuard, held a one-shot lead midway through the first round of the O.H.L. Classic at Mayakoba in Mexico.
abstract: Brian Stuard, an unheralded American, holds one-shot lead midway through the first round of the OHL Classic at Mayakoba in Mexico; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: An unheralded American, Brian Stuard, held a one-shot lead midway through the first round of the O.H.L. Classic at Mayakoba in Mexico.
